item.title: Redis主从同步和哨兵
item.description: Redis高可用解决方案: 主从同步+哨兵. <! –more –> 1. 创建数据目录 cd /nfs_data/redis_data mkdir redis_9680 mkdir redis_9682 mkdir redis_9684 2. 修改配置文件 redis-conf修改 port 6379 slaveof 172.24.29.118 9680 cluster-enabled no appendonly yes requirepass <password> masterauth <password> logfile "/data/redis.log" sentinel.conf修改 daemonize yes port 27000 sentinel monitor mymaster 172.24.29.118 9680 2 sentinel down-after-milliseconds mymaster 5000 sentinel failover-timeout mymaster 900000 sentinel parallel-syncs mymaster 2 sentinel auth-pass mymaster <password> logfile "/data/sentinel.log" 3. 运行docker # Machine 1 docker run -p 9680:6379 -p 27000:27000 --name redis_9680 --restart always --mount type=bind,src=/nfs_data/redis_data/redis_9680,dst=/data -d redis redis-server /data/redis.
